template.name: kanban
template.value:
#
  • Delete
name:

template.name: menuitem Server Action
template.value:
<record id="action_$1$" model="ir.actions.server"> <field name="name">$2$</field> <field name="model_id" ref="model_$3$"/> <field name="state">code</field> <field name="code">action = obj.$4$()</field> </record>
<menuitem name="$2$" action="action_$1$" id="menu_$1$" parent="base.menu_config" type="server" icon="STOCK_EXECUTE" sequence="100" />

template.name: wizard osv_memory menu < 7.0
template.value:
<record id="view_$1$_form" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">$2$.form</field> <field name="model">$2$</field> <field name="type">form</field> <field name="priority" eval="8"/> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <form string="$3$"> <field name="$4$"/> <separator string="" colspan="4" /> <group colspan="4" col="6"> <label string ="" colspan="2"/> <button icon="gtk-cancel" special="cancel" string="Cancel"/> <button icon="terp-gtk-go-back-rtl" string="Start" name="$5$" type="object"/> </group> </form> </field> </record>
<record model="ir.actions.act_window" id="action_$1$_view"> <field name="name">$3$</field> <field name="type">ir.actions.act_window</field> <field name="res_model">$2$</field> <field name="view_type">form</field> <field name="view_mode">form</field> <field name="domain">[]</field> <field name="context">{}</field> <field name="target">new</field> </record>
<menuitem id="menu_$1$_wizard" parent="menu_$6$" sequence="$7$" action="action_$1$_view"/>

template.name: wizard osv_memory menu >= 7.0
template.value:
<record id="view_$1$_form" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">$2$.form</field> <field name="model">$2$</field> <field name="priority" eval="8"/> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <form string="$3$" col="4" version="7.0"> <group colspan="2"> <field name="$4$"/> </group> <footer> <button type="special" special="cancel" string="Cancel" icon="gtk-cancel"/> <button type="object" string="Next" name="action_$5$" icon="gtk-ok" confirm="Are you sure you want to continue?"/> </footer> </form> </field> </record>
<record model="ir.actions.act_window" id="$1$_wizard_action"> <field name="name">$3$</field> <field name="res_model">$2$</field> <field name="view_type">form</field> <field name="view_mode">form</field> <field name="context">{}</field> <field name="target">new</field> </record>
<menuitem id="$1$_wizard_menu" parent="$6$_menu" sequence="$7$" action="$1$_wizard_action"/>

template.name: wizard osv_memory toolbar
template.value:
<record id="view_$1$_form" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">$2$.form</field> <field name="model">$2$</field> <field name="type">form</field> <field name="priority" eval="8"/> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <form string="$3$"> <field name="$4$"/> </form> </field> </record>
<record model="ir.actions.act_window" id="action_$1$_view"> <field name="name">$3$</field> <field name="type">ir.actions.act_window</field> <field name="res_model">$2$</field> <field name="view_type">form</field> <field name="view_mode">form</field> <field name="domain">[]</field> <field name="context">{}</field> <field name="target">new</field> </record>
<record model="ir.values" id="wizard_$1$"> <field name="name">$3$</field> <field name="object" eval="1"/> <field name="key">action</field> <field name="key2">client_action_multi</field> <field name="model">$5$</field> <field name="value" eval="'ir.actions.act_window,' + str(ref('action_$1$_view'))" /> </record>

template.name: view form
template.value: <record id="view_$1$_form" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">$2$.form</field> <field name="model">$2$</field> <field name="type">form</field> <field name="priority" eval="8"/> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <form string="$3$"> <field name="$4$"/> </form> </field> </record>

template.name: view tree
template.value: <record id="view_$1$_tree" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">$2$.tree</field> <field name="model">$2$</field> <field name="type">tree</field> <field name="priority" eval="8"/> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <tree string="$3$"> <field name="$4$"/> </tree> </field> </record>

template.name: view search
template.value: <record id="view_$1$_search" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">$2$.search</field> <field name="model">$2$</field> <field name="type">search</field> <field name="priority" eval="8"/> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <search string="$3$"> <field name="$4$" select="True"/> </search> </field> </record>

template.name: view both (tree, form)
template.value:
<record id="view_$1$_tree" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">$2$.tree</field> <field name="model">$2$</field> <field name="type">tree</field> <field name="priority" eval="8"/> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <tree string="$3$"> <field name="$4$"/> </tree> </field> </record>
<record id="view_$1$_form" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">$2$.form</field> <field name="model">$2$</field> <field name="type">form</field> <field name="priority" eval="8"/> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <form string="$3$"> <field name="$4$"/> </form> </field> </record>

template.name: view both (tree, form, search)
template.value:
<record id="view_$1$_tree" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">$2$.tree</field> <field name="model">$2$</field> <field name="type">tree</field> <field name="priority" eval="8"/> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <tree string="$3$"> <field name="$4$"/> </tree> </field> </record>
<record id="view_$1$_form" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">$2$.form</field> <field name="model">$2$</field> <field name="type">form</field> <field name="priority" eval="8"/> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <form string="$3$"> <field name="$4$"/> </form> </field> </record> <record id="view_$1$_search" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">$2$.search</field> <field name="model">$2$</field> <field name="type">search</field> <field name="priority" eval="8"/> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <search string="$3$"> <field name="$4$" select="True"/> </search> </field> </record>

template.name: view both (tree, form) + Action + Menu
template.value:
<record id="view_$1$_tree" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">$2$.tree</field> <field name="model">$2$</field> <field name="type">tree</field> <field name="priority" eval="8"/> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <tree string="$3$"> <field name="$4$"/> </tree> </field> </record>
<record id="view_$1$_form" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">$2$.form</field> <field name="model">$2$</field> <field name="type">form</field> <field name="priority" eval="8"/> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <form string="$3$"> <field name="$4$"/> </form> </field> </record>
<record model="ir.actions.act_window" id="act_open_$1$_view"> <field name="name">$3$</field> <field name="type">ir.actions.act_window</field> <field name="res_model">$2$</field> <field name="view_type">form</field> <field name="view_mode">tree,form</field> <field name="domain">[]</field> <field name="context">{}</field> </record>
<record model="ir.actions.act_window.view" id="act_open_$1$_view_form"> <field name="act_window_id" ref="act_open_$1$_view"/> <field name="sequence" eval="20"/> <field name="view_mode">form</field> <field name="view_id" ref="view_$1$_form"/> </record>
<record model="ir.actions.act_window.view" id="act_open_$1$_view_tree"> <field name="act_window_id" ref="act_open_$1$_view"/> <field name="sequence" eval="10"/> <field name="view_mode">tree</field> <field name="view_id" ref="view_$1$_tree"/> </record>
<menuitem id="menu_$1$" parent="$5$" sequence="20" action="act_open_$1$_view"/>

template.name: view both (tree, form, search) + Action + Menu
template.value:
<record id="view_$1$_tree" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">$2$.tree</field> <field name="model">$2$</field> <field name="type">tree</field> <field name="priority" eval="8"/> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <tree string="$3$"> <field name="$4$"/> </tree> </field> </record>
<record id="view_$1$_form" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">$2$.form</field> <field name="model">$2$</field> <field name="type">form</field> <field name="priority" eval="8"/> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <form string="$3$"> <field name="$4$"/> </form> </field> </record>
<record id="view_$1$_search" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">$2$.search</field> <field name="model">$2$</field> <field name="type">search</field> <field name="priority" eval="8"/> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <search string="$3$"> <field name="$4$" select="True"/> </search> </field> </record>
<record model="ir.actions.act_window" id="act_open_$1$_view"> <field name="name">$3$</field> <field name="type">ir.actions.act_window</field> <field name="res_model">$2$</field> <field name="view_type">form</field> <field name="view_mode">tree,form</field> <field name="search_view_id" ref="view_$1$_search"/> <field name="domain">[]</field> <field name="context">{}</field> </record>
<record model="ir.actions.act_window.view" id="act_open_$1$_view_form"> <field name="act_window_id" ref="act_open_$1$_view"/> <field name="sequence" eval="20"/> <field name="view_mode">form</field> <field name="view_id" ref="view_$1$_form"/> </record>
<record model="ir.actions.act_window.view" id="act_open_$1$_view_tree"> <field name="act_window_id" ref="act_open_$1$_view"/> <field name="sequence" eval="10"/> <field name="view_mode">tree</field> <field name="view_id" ref="view_$1$_tree"/> </record>
<menuitem id="menu_$1$" parent="$5$" sequence="20" action="act_open_$1$_view"/>

template.name: view form (inherit)
template.value: <record id="view_$1$_form" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">$2$.form</field> <field name="model">$2$</field> <field name="inherit_id" ref="$3$"/> <field name="priority" eval="8"/> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <xpath expr="//notebook" position="inside"> <page string="$4$"> <field name="$5$"/> </page> </xpath> </field> </record>
